EmailTemplate.name: 201902_EMEAI_Event_HOC_Athens_mih.201902_EMEAI_Confirmation_HOC_Athens_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] 2019 HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE EUROPE MIDDLE-EAST AFRICA & INDIA (EMEAI)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming event. We'd like to confirm that you have successfully registered for the following event:
Event: 2019 Honeywell Operators Conference Europe Middle-East Africa & India (EMEAI)
Date: Tuesday, Feb. 19 - Thursday, Feb. 21, 2019
Location: Radisson Blu Park Hotel <[[https://www.radissonblu.com/en/hotel-athens]]>, Leof. Alexandras 10, Athina 106 82, Greece
Should you need assistance for VISA application, or registration issues, please contact Lara Wilson - lara.wilson@honeywell.com <[[mailto:lara.wilson@honeywell.com]]>.
We look forward to meeting you!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
